description:
Libvirt is a critical component of Nova and has undergone many revisions. There is a need to increase statement and branch coverage of it's classes as per the requirements of diablo testing blueprint.
https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/diablo-testing

Add more tests for connection.py in nova.virt.libvirt.
title: Increase code coverage for Libvirt module

comments.content:
Libvirt is a critical component of Nova and has undergone many revisions. There is a need to increase statement and branch coverage of it's classes as per the requirements of diablo testing blueprint.
https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/diablo-testing

Add more tests for connection.py.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rohitk

comments.content:
I hadn't noticed this bug and the corresponding branch. :(

I'm working on something quite similar at lp:~soren/nova/virt-test-improvements/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content:
Soren has made good progress on this since the bug was last updated. Re-assigning

Soren - do you think this can be marked fixed?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content: Looking at the mass of code changes of the test files, this bug seems solved. Marking this old bug as "fix released" - if I'm wrong, please re-open!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fifieldt
